description: A request to the JetStream $JS.API.CONSUMER.MSG.NEXT API
title: io.nats.jetstream.api.v1.consumer_getnext_request

expires.description: A duration from now when the pull should expire, stated in nanoseconds, 0 for no expiry
expires.$comment: nanoseconds depicting a duration in time, signed 64 bit integer

batch.description: How many messages the server should deliver to the requestor
batch.$comment: integer with a dynamic bit size depending on the platform the cluster runs on, can be up to 64bit

max_bytes.description: Sends at most this many bytes to the requestor, limited by consumer configuration max_bytes
max_bytes.$comment: integer with a dynamic bit size depending on the platform the cluster runs on, can be up to 64bit

no_wait.description: When true a response with a 404 status header will be returned when no messages are available

idle_heartbeat.description: When not 0 idle heartbeats will be sent on this interval
idle_heartbeat.$comment: nanoseconds depicting a duration in time, signed 64 bit integer

group.description: The consumer group to pull from

min_pending.description: The minimum number of messages the server should have in the consumer's pending queue before serving this pull

min_ack_pending.description: The minimum number of messages the server should have in the consumer's ack pending queue before serving this pull

id.description: When pulling from a Pinned Client consumer this is the unique client ID

priority.description: The priority of the pull request
